rt

Interface Sampler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OneSampler, RandomSampler

    public interface Sampler
    Makes random samples, which are used for Monte Carlo rendering. The samples always need to lie in the range [0,1]. Various versions such as purely random, jittered, or low discrepancy samplers could be implemented.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float[][] makeSamples(int n, int d)
      Make an array of samples.

    • Method Detail

      • makeSamples

        float[][] makeSamples(int n,
                    int d)
        Make an array of samples. The samples need to lie in the range [0,1]^d, where d is the dimensionality of the samples. The number of returned samples may differ from the number of desired samples n.
        Parameters:
        n - desired number of samples
        d - dimensionality of samples
        Returns:
        the array of d-dimensional samples samples
